verbs.description: [ARG0: A federal investigative agency] [V: sent] [ARG1: a letter] [ARG2: to President Trump and Congress] [C-ARG1: notifying them of mismanagement at a Navy site in California] .
A federal investigative agency sent [ARG0: a letter] to President Trump and Congress [V: notifying] [ARG1: them] [ARG2: of mismanagement at a Navy site in California] .
